name: Casa Turrent - 1880 - Maduro Lancero
additionalNotes: The new line Casa Turrent 1880 is a tribute to the 140 years of tradition and heritage of the Turrent family in the tobacco industry. These authentic and tasty vitolas are Alejandro's heart project. Rolled in his favorite format of 55 x 6.5, they seduce with their unique aroma, which is the result of the stored tobaccos: all the leaves of the capes have been aged for at least 5 years, and for the undercaps and tripe, small batches of different tobaccos, each aged for 10 to 12 years, are used, depending on the blend.
